ISSUE.TITLE: _ProductBox.cshtml ShortDescription is hidden by css in DefaultClean
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.5, probably also before Steps to reproduce the problem: * Create a product * Add a short description * View the product in frontend-catalog * You will not see the short description, although it was added to the view: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/bc20a8b8ebdfe29ee003c643363ec81b81bcdd8c/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Views/Shared/_ProductBox.cshtml#L55-L57 * Inspect the elements and find that this rule is causing a problem: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/bc20a8b8ebdfe29ee003c643363ec81b81bcdd8c/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Themes/DefaultClean/Content/css/styles.css#L1770-L1772 Expected behaviour: If you add the short description to the view in the product box, it should also be visible in the DefaultClean Theme.
